mapper.select: select user_id userId, username, password from t_user where username = #{username}
select c.role_code from t_user a inner join t_user_role b inner join t_role c on a.user_id = b.user_id and b.role_id = c.role_id where a.username = #{username}
SELECT d.permission_id permissionId FROM t_user a, t_user_role b, t_role_permission c, t_permission d WHERE b.role_id = c.role_id AND c.permission_id = d.permission_id AND a.username = #{username}
